name: Calculated Loss
description: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

name: Ancient Archives
description: Gain 1 Tome of Traits.

name: Dominance
description: After winning your player combat, gain 1 bonus gold for every 2 surviving units.

name: Item Grab Bag I
description: Gain 1 random completed item(s).

name: Phony Frontline
description: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

name: Hyper Roll
description: If you have less than 10 gold at the end of a round, gain 2 gold.

name: Pandora's Items
description: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

name: Ascension
description: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

name: Built Different I
description: Your units with no Traits active gain 300 Health and 50% Attack Speed.

name: Celestial Blessing I
description: Your units heal for 12% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

name: Knife's Edge I
description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Implants I
description: Your champions holding an item gain 150 Health and 10 Attack Damage.

name: Exiles I
description: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 30% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

name: Featherweights I
description: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 25% Attack Speed and movement speed.

name: First Aid Kit
description: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

name: Makeshift Armor I
description: Your units with no items gain 35 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Stand United I
description: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Thrill of the Hunt I
description: Your units heal 400 Health on kill.

name: Underdogs
description: Whenever your team has fewer units alive than your opponent, your units regenerate 9% of their missing Health each second (maximum: 150).

name: Weakspot
description: Your units' attacks ignore 20% of the target's Armor and reduce healing received by 50% for 5 seconds.

name: Arcanist Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Arcanist. Gain a Swain.

name: Runic Shield I
description: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 300% of their Ability Power for 8 seconds.

name: Assassin Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Assassin. Gain a Talon.

name: Cutthroat
description: Assassins Mana Reave the first unit they attack, increasing their maximum Mana by 65% until they cast.

name: Bodyguard Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bodyguard. Gain a Blitzcrank.

name: Stand Behind Me
description: Increases the Bodyguard Armor bonus by 25%. At the start of combat, Bodyguards grant 100% of their Armor bonus to non-Bodyguard allies directly behind them (does not stack).

name: Bruiser Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Bruiser. Gain a Trundle.

name: Shrug It Off
description: Bruisers regenerate 2.5% of their maximum Health each second.

name: Challenger Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Challenger. Gain a Quinn.

name: En Garde
description: The first time an enemy is attacked by a Challenger, they are Disarmed for 3 seconds.

name: Chemical Overload I
description: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 20% of their max Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

name: Chemtech Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Chemtech. Gain a Zac.

name: Clockwork Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Clockwork. Gain a Zilean.

name: Enchanter Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Enchanter. Gain a Taric.

name: Ardent Censer
description: Allies healed or shielded by Enchanters gain 50% stacking Attack Speed for the rest of combat (maximum once every 4 seconds).

name: Enforcer Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Enforcer. Gain a Vi.

name: Innovator Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Innovator.

name: Self Repair
description: When the Innovation dies, it will become untargetable and repair itself if an Innovator is still alive.

name: Mercenary Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mercenary.

name: Pirates
description: Mercenary units have a 50% chance to drop 1 gold when they kill an enemy.

name: Mutant Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mutant. Gain a Kog'Maw.

name: Unstable Evolution
description: Mutants randomly gain one of the following when they reach 2 star: 500 Health, 30% Attack Speed, 30 Attack Damage, or 30 Ability Power. These bonuses stack.

name: Scholar Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scholar. Gain a Zyra.

name: Lifelong Learning
description: Scholars permanently gain 2 Ability Power after each combat, and an additional 2 if they survived.

name: Scrap Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Scrap. Gain a Blitzcrank.

name: Sniper's Nest
description: Snipers gain +10% damage for each round fought from the same starting hex. (Maximum +40%)

name: Sniper Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sniper. Gain a Tristana.

name: Duet
description: Summon 1 additional Socialite spotlight. Spotlighted units gain 400 Health.

name: Socialite Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Socialite.

name: Syndicate Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Syndicate. Gain a Zyra.

name: One For All
description: When your Syndicates die, they grant your other Syndicates 20 Attack Damage and Ability Power.

name: Payday
description: After winning your combat, gain 1 bonus gold for each surviving Syndicate.

name: Twinshot Heart
description: Your team counts as having 1 additional Twinshot. Gain a Kog'Maw.

name: So Small
description: Yordles gain 35% Dodge Chance.

name: Rich Get Richer
description: Gain 10 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

name: Binary Airdrop
description: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat.

name: Clear Mind
description: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of a round, gain 3 experience points.

name: Trade Sector
description: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

name: Sunfire Board
description: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 20% of their maximum Health over 10 seconds and reduce healing received by 50%.

name: Metabolic Accelerator
description: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health at the end of each PVP round.

name: Salvage Bin
description: Gain a random completed item. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

name: Portable Forge
description: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

name: Knife's Edge II
description: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Implants II
description: Your champions holding an item gain 250 Health and 20 Attack Damage.

name: Exiles II
description: Your units that start combat with no adjacent allies gain a 45% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

name: Featherweights II
description: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 35% Attack Speed and movement speed.

name: Built Different II
description: Your units with no Traits active gain 400 Health and 60% Attack Speed.

name: Stand United II
description: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Titanic Force
description: Your units with more than 1400 maximum Health gain Attack Damage equal to 3% of their maximum Health.

name: Makeshift Armor II
description: Your units with no items gain 55 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Celestial Blessing II
description: Your units heal for 20% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 450 Health.

name: Thrill of the Hunt II
description: Your units heal 700 Health on kill.

name: Arcane Crest
description: Gain an Arcanist Emblem and a Swain.

name: Runic Shield II
description: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 450% of their Ability Power for 8 seconds.

name: Spell Blade
description: After casting their Ability, Arcanists' next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 225% of their Ability Power. Spell Blade's damage is considered Ability damage.

name: Assassin Crest
description: Gain an Assassin Emblem and a Talon.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: The first time Assassins drops to 60% health, they briefly enter stealth, becoming untargetable and shedding all negative effects. Any excess damage is reduced by 80%.

name: Bodyguard Crest
description: Gain a Bodyguard Emblem and a Darius.

name: Bruiser Crest
description: Gain a Bruiser Emblem and a Trundle.

name: Challenger Crest
description: Gain a Challenger Emblem and a Quinn.

name: Chemtech Crest
description: Gain a Chemtech Emblem and a Warwick.

name: Chemical Overload II
description: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 30% of their max Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

name: Instant Injection
description: Chemtechs now additionally trigger their bonuses at the start of combat.

name: Clockwork Crest
description: Gain a Clockwork Emblem and a Zilean.

name: Broken Stopwatch
description: 5 seconds into combat, all enemies and non-Clockwork units are frozen in time for 4 seconds.

name: Armor Plating
description: Colossus become invulnerable for 2 seconds when their Health drops to 60% and 30%.

name: Mercenary Crest
description: Gain a Mercenary Emblem and 3 gold.

name: Gold Reserves
description: Mercenaries deal 1% more damage per 1 gold you have. (Maximum +60%)

name: Mutant Crest
description: Gain a Mutant Emblem and a Kassadin.

name: Scholar Crest
description: Gain a Scholar Emblem and a Heimerdinger.

name: Scrap Crest
description: Gain a Scrap Emblem and a Blitzcrank.

name: Junkyard
description: Gain a random component every 3 combat rounds with the Scrap Trait active.

name: Sniper Crest
description: Gain a Sniper Emblem and a Tristana.

name: Syndicate Crest
description: Gain a Syndicate Emblem and a Zyra.

name: Sharpshooter
description: Twinshot's ranged attacks and Abilities can bounce once, dealing 45% less damage.

name: Share the Spotlight
description: Allies adjacent to a spotlight at the start of combat gain 100% of its bonuses.

name: Windfall
description: Gain gold based on the number of augments you have now. 0 = 18g, 1 = 30g, 2 = 45g

name: Wise Spending
description: Gain 4 gold.Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

name: High Roller
description: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 8 gold.

name: Item Grab Bag II
description: Gain 2 random completed item(s) and a Reforger.

name: Band of Thieves
description: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

name: New Recruit
description: Gain +1 maximum team size.

name: Golden Ticket
description: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 40% chance to gain a free refresh.

name: Level Up
description: When you buy experience points, gain an additional 3. You can now reach level 10.

name: High End Shopping
description: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher.

name: Woodland Charm
description: At the start of combat, your highest Health Champion creates a 1600 Health copy of themself (excluding items).

name: March of Progress
description: Gain 5 bonus experience points per round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

name: Exiles III
description: Your units that start combat with no adjacent allies gain a 70% maximum Health shield for 8 seconds.

name: Featherweights III
description: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 55% Attack Speed and movement speed.

name: Knife's Edge III
description: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 50 Attack Damage.

name: Cybernetic Implants III
description: Your champions holding an item gain 350 Health and 30 Attack Damage.

name: Built Different III
description: Your units with no Traits active gain 500 Health and 70% Attack Speed.

name: Stand United III
description: Your units gain 5 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

name: Makeshift Armor III
description: Your units with no items gain 75 Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Celestial Blessing III
description: Your units heal for 25% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 600 Health.

name: Runic Shield III
description: Arcanists start combat with a shield equal to 600% of their Ability Power for 8 seconds.

name: Arcanist Crown
description: Gain 2 Arcanist Emblems.

name: Assassin Crown
description: Gain 2 Assassin Emblems.

name: Bodyguard Crown
description: Gain 2 Bodyguard Emblems.

name: Bruiser Crown
description: Gain 2 Bruiser Emblems.

name: Challenger Crown
description: Gain 2 Challenger Emblems.

name: Chemical Overload III
description: Chemtechs explode on death, dealing 40% of their max Health as magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.

name: Chemtech Crown
description: Gain 2 Chemtech Emblems.

name: Clockwork Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Clockworks. Gain 8 gold.

name: Enchanter Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Enchanters. Gain 8 gold.

name: Enforcer Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Enforcers. Gain 8 gold.

name: Innovator Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Innovators.

name: Mercenary Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Mercenaries.

name: Mutant Crown
description: Gain 2 Mutant Emblems.

name: Scholar Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Scholars. Gain 8 gold.

name: Scrap Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Scraps. Gain 8 gold.

name: Sniper Crown
description: Gain 2 Sniper Emblems.

name: Socialite Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Socialites.

name: Syndicate Crown
description: Gain 2 Syndicate Emblems.

name: Twinshot Soul
description: Your team counts as having 2 additional Twinshots. Gain 8 gold.
